resources.string: Catch up on all things Cinema.
Pick a section and explore the MovieApp

This is just a simple movie application using the TMDb API. All the movie data and categories is fetched from thought the API. This app has no commercial use and is only used for app development practice.

The Movie Database (TMDb) is a community built movie and TV database. Every piece of data has been added by our amazing community dating back to 2008. TMDb\'s strong international focus and breadth of data is largely unmatched.
